price: 32. Jie sakė: „Nūhai (Nojau), tu ginčijaisi su mumis ir labai ištęsei ginčą su mumis, dabar pateik mums tai, kuo mums grasini, jei esi sakantis tiesą.“
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰنُوحُ قَدۡ جَٰدَلۡتَنَا فَأَكۡثَرۡتَ جِدَٰلَنَا فَأۡتِنَا بِمَا تَعِدُنَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū yānūḥu qad jādaltanā fa-aktharta jidālanā fatinā bimā taʿidunā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
